name: Escape from M.A.G.I.C. Inc.
description:
What am I doing here? I don't recognize this office. And what is M.A.G.I.C. Inc.? Is it those guys that are trying to capitalize on magic spells?

You wake up in a dark, hostile office, and you have to find your way out. Discover what kind of magic they are making here, and use your new powers to overcome the obstacles in your way.

Escape from M.A.G.I.C. Inc. is a puzzle game where you have to use your powers in different ways to escape the office.

An entry in the 2020 Nordic Game Jam Online.
